maqras.text: Those submit completely GOD chvila leading righteous zivot gotten hold z strongest puto! For GOD bol full control all things
Mat rad for those disbelieve nie saddened ich disbelief! Do us je ich ultimate spatny listok potom my informovat them z everything they robit. GOD bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
My let them enjoy temporarily potom commit them severe retribution
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem they say GOD Say Chvalit je do GOD vela z them nie zauzlit
Do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! GOD bol the Vela ZIRNY ZASLUZNY
all strom zem robit into pens ocean zasoba ink zvacsit 7 inak oceans words GOD nie run out! GOD bol Almighty Wise
creation vzkriesenie z all z ona bol same mat rad ze z 1 clovek. GOD bol Hearer Seer

Ona nie realize lenze GOD merges night dni robit merges dni into night ze He committed sun moon tvoj servis each running do its orbit specific zivot span GOD bol fully Cognizant z everything ona robit
This proves lenze GOD bol truth chvila any idol they set Him je falsehood a lenze GOD bol the Vela High Velky
Ona nie see ships roam sea beriem GOD's robit provisions show ona some z Jeho proofs Indeed these je sufficient proofs everyone bol steadfast appreciative

When violent kyvat surround them they implore GOD sincerely devoting ich prayers Him alone mat rad skoro mat rad He saves them shore some z them revert Ziaden discards our revelations those bol betrayers unappreciative

O zaludnit ona reverence tvoj Lord fear dni when otca nie pomoc jeho own dieta nor mozem dieta pomoc jeho otca! Istota GOD's promise bol truth. Therefore nie zmateny this zivot; nie zmateny GOD mere iluzia

S GOD bol znalost Hodiny (koniec world He je 1 kto sends nadol dazo He zauzlit contents womb! Ziaden soul zauzlit co will happen it zajtra ziaden 1 zauzlit kto zem he ona umrel! GOD bol Omniscient Cognizant)
A L. M
Rezervovat Si bol doubt revelation Lord universe
They said He fabricated it Indeed this bol truth tvoj Lord warn ludia kto never received warner ona they guided
GOD JE JEDEN created heavens ZEM everything them 6 DNI POTOM assumed all authority Ona have ziaden Him mat rad Lord nor robit ona have intercessor! Ona nie berie heed
All zalezitost controlled Him heaven zem! Do Him dni bol equivalent do 1000 z tvoj rocnik
Knower z all secrets declarations; Almighty Merciful
He je Jeden zdokonalit everything He created zaciatok creation human z il
Potom He zotrvat jeho reproduction certain lowly kvapalina
He shaped him blew him Jeho spirit He dat ona hearing eyesight inteligencia; zriedka bol ona thankful
They zazrak After my zmiznut zem robit my created znova? Thus mat rad zretel schodza ich Lord they bol disbelievers
